original_text: And Absalom met the servants of David. And Absalom rode upon a mule, and the mule went under the thick boughs of a great oak, and his head caught hold of the oak, and he was taken up between the heaven and the earth; and the mule that was under him went away.
korean_text: 압살롬이 다윗의 부하들과 마주치니라 압살롬이 노새를 탔는데 그 노새가 큰 상수리나무 번성한 가지 아래로 지날 때에 압살롬의 머리가 그 상수리나무에 걸리매 그가 공중에 달리고 그가 탔던 노새는 그 땅과 공중 사이로 빠져나간지라

sentences.original_text: And Absalom met the servants of David.
And Absalom rode upon a mule,
and the mule went under the thick boughs of a great oak,
sentences.korean_translation: 나귀는 큰 떡갈나무의 두꺼운 가지 아래로 들어갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: and his head caught hold of the oak,
and he was taken up between heaven and earth;
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하늘과 땅 사이에 매달리게 되었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and the mule that was under him went away.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 아래에 있던 나귀는 달아났습니다.
